bibl.title: with the assistance of C.G. WILLIAMSON, Political Culture in the Greek City after the Classical Age.

series.title: Groningen - Royal Holloway Studies on the Greek City after the Classical Age.

bibl.note: 12 contributions, presented during workshops organised in Groningen, 2003, and London, 2004. - Pp. ix-x: Preface; - 1-26: O.M.v.N. and R.A., Political Culture in the Greek City after the Classical Age: Introduction and Preview; - 307-336: R.A., Epilogue: Post-politics and the Ancient Greek City; - 337-343: Index Locorum; - 344-349: Index.
bibl.seg: VAN NIJF Onno M. and Richard ALSTON (Edd.), with the assistance of C.G. WILLIAMSON, Political Culture in the Greek City after the Classical Age. (Groningen - Royal Holloway Studies on the Greek City after the Classical Age. 2.)
Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, Peeters, 2011, 8°, xii-349 pp. ISBN 978-90-429-2319-5. €75.

12 contributions, presented during workshops organised in Groningen, 2003, and London, 2004. - Pp. ix-x: Preface; - 1-26: O.M.v.N. and R.A., Political Culture in the Greek City after the Classical Age: Introduction and Preview; - 307-336: R.A., Epilogue: Post-politics and the Ancient Greek City; - 337-343: Index Locorum; - 344-349: Index.
